CSSHypot.summary: The hypot() CSS function is an exponential function that returns the square root of the sum of squares of its parameters.

remarks.para: While pow and sqrt only work on unitless numbers, hypot() accepts values with units, but they all must have the same type.

CSSHypot.returns: Returns a {{CSSxRef("<number>")}}, {{CSSxRef("<dimension>")}}, or {{CSSxRef("<percentage>")}} (based on the inputs), which is the square root of the sum of squares of its parameters.
